definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: Most of the reactions were mild and of the urticarial type.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的不良反應是不嚴重的蕁麻疹類型的。

sentences.english: Treatment depends on which type or types of urticaria you have.
sentences.chinese: 治療取決於哪些類型的蕁麻疹你。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the effect of behavior therapy on treating chronic urticaria .
sentences.chinese: 目的分析行爲療法治療慢性蕁麻疹的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion Levocetirizine is an effective and safe agent for the treatment of CIU.
sentences.chinese: 結論左西替利嗪治療慢性蕁麻疹安全有效。

sentences.english: This paper introduces 12 cases of pityriasis rosea complicated by urticaria.
sentences.chinese: 報道了12例玫瑰糠疹合併蕁麻疹病例。

sentences.english: Cyproheptadine may be useful to suppress recurrent cold urticaria.
sentences.chinese: 賽庚啶可能有助於抑制經常性寒冷性蕁麻疹。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical features and mechanism of urticarial vasculitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討蕁麻疹性血管炎臨牀特徵及發病機理。

sentences.english: Urticaria is the most benign form of anaphylaxis.
sentences.chinese: 蕁麻疹是最良性的形式過敏反應。

sentences.english: Methods 593 children with acute urticaria were subjected to routine ECG examination.
sentences.chinese: 方法對急性蕁麻疹患兒593例行常規心電圖檢查。

sentences.english: Some patients with anaphylactic shock have urticaria or wheezing.
sentences.chinese: 有些過敏性休克病人會有蕁麻疹或喘鳴。

sentences.english: Itching and seasonal rhinitis, perennial allergic rhinitis induced urticaria.
sentences.chinese: 瘙癢和季節性鼻炎，常年性過敏性鼻炎引起的蕁麻疹。

sentences.english: Refractory cases of chronic urticaria may improve with glucocorticosteroids.
sentences.chinese: 難治例慢性蕁麻疹，可改善與糖皮質類固醇。

sentences.english: Xiaofengsan could obviously relieve itching, and resist experimental nettle rash.
sentences.chinese: 消風散具有明顯的止癢和抗實驗性蕁麻疹作用。

sentences.english: Non-allergic causes of acute urticaria include.
sentences.chinese: 非過敏原因的急性蕁麻疹，包括。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the serum histamine-releasing activity of patients with primary acquired cold urticaria (PACU).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討原發性獲得性寒冷性蕁麻疹的組胺釋放活性。

sentences.english: Who knows to treat stubborn sex urticaria to be treated well Jilin city where?
sentences.chinese: 誰知到吉林市哪裏治療頑固性蕁麻疹治得好？

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
